snippet: Peter Jackson concludes his trilogy treatment of J. R. R. Tolkien’s “The Hobbit” with a film devoted to warfare and driven by greed.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies, directed by Peter Jackson and starring Ian McKellen and Martin Freeman.
lead_paragraph: Peter Jackson concludes his trilogy treatment of J. R. R. Tolkien’s “The Hobbit” with a film devoted to warfare and driven by greed.
